name: Grotesque Patchwork
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You take flesh from a dead creature within range and weave it into the wounds of an injured creature within range that you can see, restoring 5d6 hit points.

The creature corpse used for this can't be targeted by this spell again.

You can't target undead creature corpses, but you can target your own reanimated creatures instead of a corpse. Doing so sets your reanimated creature to 0 hit points, and you can't use its corpse as a target again.
empower: Healing increased by 1d6. You can distribute each die of healing among any other creatures in range.
